text: Ville Valo (born November 22, 1976nndb.com) is a Finnish baritone singer and songwriter. He is the lead singer in the Finnish rock band HIM. He lives in Helsinki, Finland. == References == == Other websites == * HIMzone666 * HIMzone666.forum Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish singer-songwriters Category:Baritones Category:Singers from Helsinki
title: Ville Valo
